OOC: Does Blackfang has a maximal simbol that Nightlight can see????

Nightlight::

Nightlight nodded as if she tried to show that she had understood him 
"Ye... ye"started to stammered as if she tried to speak and she 
couldn't find the words.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang tried to look non-threatening, but his natural look was 
> still quite strange.
> 
> Blackfang: Huh... Hello! I'm Blackfang! Do you understand what I'm 
> saying? can you answer me?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > Nightlight:
> > > 
> > > Nightlight was woke up, altought she was stunned and she started 
> to 
> > > stammered as if she tried to use a language that she had 
forgotten 
> > > but she couldn't remember it.
> > > 
> > 
> > "Try and talk to her, com link me if anything happens, I'll inform
> > Talos" Kenzo said to Blackfang and walked to Talos's office "Sir, 
> the
> > maximal that was in the stasis pod, Nightlight, has been awoken,
> > although is having problems adapting to the new language 
circuitry.
> > The CR chambor might be able to repair help"
